com.example.progetto.csv

Class CsvParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.progetto.csv.CsvParser

  • public class CsvParser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods and attributes to implement the parsing logic of our csv, that means that we read the csv and we abstract its information in two objects, one representing the first line of heading and the second one representing a generic line of the dataset.PaymentHeader

      • displayParse

        public void displayParse()
        For the porpouse of this project this method is never used, but we used it for debug porpouses to print two vectors using the method "print" defined in the class CsvUtilities.java. If the file has not been parsed yet and this method is called from main method, it launches an illegalstateExeption.

      • ParserLogic

        private void ParserLogic()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        this method implements the parsing algorithm
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - this covers an I/O error that occurs when reading or writing from a BufferedReader stream and FileReader stream
